#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &n );
		string s;

		cin >> s;
		vector<int> A( n + 1 );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			scanf("%d", &A[ i ] );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			swap( s[ i ], s[ A[ i ] - 1 ] );

		cout << s << endl;	
	}

	return 0;
}
